Verses: 1 evanudaiya Meerudhal Mannikkappattadho, Evanudaiya Paavam Moodappattadho, Avan Baakkiyavaan.
2 evanudaiya Akkiramaththaik Karththar Ennaadhirukkiraaro, Evanudaiya Aaviyil Kabadamillaadhirukkiradho, Avan Baakkiyavaan.
3 naan Adakkivaiththamattum, Niththam En Kadharudhalinaale En Elumbugal Ularndhupoyitru.
4 iravum Pagalum Enmel Ummudaiya Kai Baaramaayirundhadhinaal, En Saaram Ushnakaala Varatchipola Varandupoyitru. (selaa.)
5 naan En Akkiramaththai Maraikkaamal, En Paavaththai Umakku Ariviththen; En Meerudhalkalaik Karththarukku Arikkaiyiduven Endren; Dhevareer En Paavaththin Thoshaththai Manniththeer. (selaa.)
6 idharkaakach Sagaayankidaikkung Kaalaththil Pakdhiyullavanevanum Ummai Nokki Vinnappanjeyvaan; Appozhudhu Migundha Jalappiravaagam Vandhaalum Adhu Avanai Anugaadhu.
7 neer Enakku Maraividamaayirukkireer; Ennai Neer Ikkattukku Vilakkikkaaththu, Ratchaniyap Paadalgal Ennaich Soozhndhukollumbadi Seyveer. (selaa.)
8 naan Unakkup Podhiththu, Nee Nadakkavendiya Vazhiyai Unakkuk Kaattuven; Unmel En Kannai Vaiththu, Unakku Aalosanai Solluven.
9 vaarinaalum Kadivaalaththinaalum Vaai Kattappattaalozhiya, Un Kittach Seraadha Puththiyillaak Kudhiraiyaippolavum Koveru Kazhudhaiyaippolavum Irukkavendaam.
10 thunmaarkkanukku Anega Vedhanaigalundu; Karththarai Nambiyirukkiravanaiyo Kirubai Soozhndhukollum.
11 needhimaangale, Karththarukkul Magizhndhu Kalikoorungal; Semmaiyaana Irudhayamullavargale, Neengal Ellaarum Aanandha Muzhakkamidungal.
